CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in New Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 11, 1967, pg. 12, reads: "Junior High Champions - Joining in celebration of their repeat performance as kingpins of the city's junior high school basketball teams, are the above members of the 1966-1967 Herron Hill Junior High team, managers and trainers. Seen among the throng, from left, are Addie Anderson, Joe Moss, James Brown, Don Alexander, Fred Ortman, Clarence Hopson, James Franklin, Gerald Hall, Maurice Lucas, and Coach Russell Crutchfield.  Starting members of champions (kneeling) are Chris Thomas, Clarke Burk, Butch Wallace, Ricky Coleman and Donald Davis. - Harris photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of 1966-1967 Herron Hill Junior High basketball team, kneeling from left: #3 Chris Thomas, Clarke Burk, Butch Wallace, Ricky Coleman, Donald Davis; standing: Addie Anderson, Joe Moss, James Brown, Don Alexander, Fred Ortman, Clarence Hopson, James Franklin, Gerald Hall, Maurice Lucas, and Coach Russell Crutchfield, cheering underneath hoop in gymnasium
